amendment.description: Page 105, after line 16, insert the following new section: \ SEC. 519. The amount otherwise provided by this Act for "DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES--Office of the Secretary--General Departmental Management" is hereby reduced by $84,500.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for General Departmental Management of the Office of the Secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services by $84,500.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stark amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 216 (Roll no. 437).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Stark.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stark amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 216 (Roll no. 437).
